parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The `token` that is used to initiate the next request if the response of the current request is truncated. You can use the token to initiate another request and obtain the remaining records.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource shares.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource share.

You can specify up to 20 resource shares.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The resource type.

Set the value to `ResourceShare`.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
The tags.

This parameter specifies a filter condition for the query. You can specify up to 20 tags.
